title: W.t.s- 1911 sporting life joe tinker psa 8mk!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: W.t.s- 1911 sporting life joe tinker psa 8mk!
posts.post_content: Another blazer! Also features a rare black back that demands up to a 30% premium. Card is perfectly centered with razor sharp corners. Mk designation is for a small "ss" written at the extreme lower right corner. This obviously was to indicate short stop. This card has an extremely rare psa population. Last i checked, there were only 4 graded higher than a psa 6! Pics available upon request. A bargain for only $750. Thanks, would consider high grade t206s for trade
Bump. Need to sell. Would consider reasonable offer. Thanks
